name: Grilled Brie
description: Grilled brie is a 3 ingredient appetizer that's perfect for summer + fall. Top with a drizzle of honey + nuts, or customize with my fun ideas!
instructions: Soak a cedar plank in water for at least 30 minutes, up to 4 hours. This will keep it from burning. Preheat your grill to medium high. Place your cheese on the plank. Place plank on top of the grate. Grill with lid closed for 7-8 minutes. Add honey and nuts over the top, and grill for another 2 minutes to warm through. Remove from grill and serve warm directly from cedar plank, or remove to a platter.
